osvSchema.details: SQL injection vulnerability in Presta Monster "Multi Accessories Pro" (hsmultiaccessoriespro) module for PrestaShop versions 5.1.1 and before, allows remote attackers to escalate privileges and obtain sensitive information via the method HsAccessoriesGroupProductAbstract::getAccessoriesByIdProducts().

description_data.value: SQL injection vulnerability in Presta Monster "Multi Accessories Pro" (hsmultiaccessoriespro) module for PrestaShop versions 5.1.1 and before, allows remote attackers to escalate privileges and obtain sensitive information via the method HsAccessoriesGroupProductAbstract::getAccessoriesByIdProducts().

descriptions.value: SQL injection vulnerability in Presta Monster "Multi Accessories Pro" (hsmultiaccessoriespro) module for PrestaShop versions 5.1.1 and before, allows remote attackers to escalate privileges and obtain sensitive information via the method HsAccessoriesGroupProductAbstract::getAccessoriesByIdProducts().

Vulnerabilidad de inyección SQL en el módulo Presta Monster "Multi Accessories Pro" (hsmultiaccessoriespro) para PrestaShop versiones 5.1.1 y anteriores, permite a atacantes remotos escalar privilegios y obtener información confidencial a través del método HsAccessoriesGroupProductAbstract::getAccessoriesByIdProducts().
